website_summaries.verdict: Modern look, fogless for life and will easily adhere to most surfaces.
pros: Customers appreciate the large surface space as well as the adjustable neck that helps minimize uncomfortable poses
We like the silicone adhesive features, as opposed to suction cups, which can look bulky
The product's reflective quality is enhanced by a border of LED lighting that reduces the appearance of shadows
cons: The LED lighting won't light an entire bathroom, but works well for intended purposes

customer_reviews.title: You had one job.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the anti-fog concept works. That's about it. Cons: THE MIRROR IS WARPED. If you have a beard, when you're shaving your neck, you need to be able to see accurately to line the beard up with the jawline, or your face looks lopsided. This thing is so warped, that is impossible. Also, the LEDs are a joke. They somehow manage to be both blinding, and too dim to do any good. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OhCrapiHastheRuns

customer_reviews.title: Best shower mirror out there!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't bother leaving reviews but felt the need to in this case. Been using this product for a few months now and am more than pleased. I've had several "fog free" mirrors in the past and they all pale in comparison to this one. I spend about 15-20 min in the shower shaving my head and face and have had no issues with this mirror. $40 for a large, lighted and truly fog free mirror is a bargain if you ask me. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get around to installing this right away, and now it's past the date I can return it or else it'd be back in the box going back for a refund! The LED lights are pretty much worthless. Only slightly light up your face if you're within a couple inches of the mirror. The fog-less feature works ok, if you use scalding hot water. Pulling the mirror off the bracket to drain the water afterwards is a pain. All in all.... I wish I hadn't wasted money on this thing and do not recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Ginther

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Mirror should be made of glass. It expands as it is filled with water. It makes the face stretch. Not to mention that it still fogs up. The squeegee that comes with it doesn't work for nothing. The light doesn't really laminate much unless your showering in the dark. I'm not gonna return it because it's already mounted on my shower wall. Product needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Palacios  Jr

customer_reviews.title: smart buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower mirror. I've used a cheap shower mirror for 15 years and it had reached the end of its rope, so I decided its time to upgrade. I still have it. But this is the cats meow. I truly recommend this to anyone who is dedicated to shaving in the shower, just because of the bells and whistles this item has. lights up, the mirror itself is extremely clear, and its adjustable up and down. My old mirror used suction cups and eventually it began to lose the ability to stay on the shower wall. This mirror will never come down. buy it if you shave in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: slow hand

customer_reviews.title: No Fog and Limited Lighting
customer_reviews.text: As long as you put the water in the reservoir, you will not have any fogging issues. The light is only moderately functional for shaving as it kind of does not focus the light in your shaving areas as much as one would like. However, I have a dark shower curtain so the light does provide more overall shower lighting, which is highly desired. I have had the smaller non-lit version for a few years and have never had any issues with fogging or the suction assembly. This larger version, though, has compatible parts with the smaller version. The assembly frame and squeegees are the same sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in Less Than One Year
customer_reviews.text: The mirror started out great - mounting is easy, size is nice, LED light was bright and useful. After about 2 months, I noticed the light was getting noticeably dimmer - I chalked it up to weak batteries. After about 5 months, the light did not come at all, so I replaced the batteries. No joy. I tried a new set - still nothing. Apparently the dimming was a flaw in the lighting system - so now I have an LED mirror with no light. I am MORE than disappointed in this product. The whole point of LEDs is that they should last longer than I do... And, of course, I am beyond the return window... so...
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't Fallen
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent mirror, for what it is. The anti-fogging system works as advertised, and it hasn't fallen since mounting it, so that's all to the good. I also appreciate the size, although it's still smaller than I'd have preferred. The mirror is somewhat warped, so your reflection is a bit distorted the closer you get to the edges, but it's sufficient for the job. The only real complaint I have is the light, which is next to useless. It illuminates the surface, meaning it doesn't shine outward to light up your face. So it's a nice decoration, but useless for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The light didn't last 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The LED just quit working in less than one year on one of ours. The other one has so many water marks that won't come off. I don't know how to clean it. The one with no lights is now worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Ahowe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After checking out the mirror, which I liked, I ended up giving it away simply because the LEDs were not bright enough. Not saying a lot perhaps as I am visually impaired, so it just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wildblue

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without this for shaving my head
customer_reviews.text: Third mirror like this from this company. First one didn't have the light. The version with the light is nice. I don't have a light in my shower/tub. When I pull the curtain it gets darker in the shower. I shave my head - so I couldn't imagine life without a mirror like this in the shower. I'm replacing my other one (leaving the mount...hopefully nothing has changed) because the light function went out on my last one. As long as they make these, I'll be buying them as needed.
customer_reviews.author: SnowB1 Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product BUT DIDN'T HOLD
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product from the moment I installed it UNTIL 3 days later when I walked into the bathroom and found all of it laying on the floor of the shower. Did not hold at all. If you have the slick, porcelain style tiles, this will more than likely work for you. But, if you have the stone, rough style tiles, don't bother unless you are planning on drilling this in. So disappointed because this "fog-free" mirror actually works and the LED lights are great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Serious Defect
customer_reviews.text: I had a mirror of that type without lights and I loved it, The upgrade and the price was a total letdown. Reason soon after first use the lights stopped working. Opened the battery box and it was full of rust. The seal did not keep the water out so now I am back to the old mirror without light which would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Starr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This mirror seemed great in theory. However, it’s light isn’t very bright at all and the idea of having to empty and fill it in order for it to be fogless is annoying. Worst off all is that it’s plastic mirror beds in a way that reflects your shape in an awkward way. Some parts of it make you looks normal, some thin and some unnatractively chubby.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase, Already Has Paid For Itself.
customer_reviews.text: Very much enjoying this product, performs as advertised. The adhesive stuck firmly to my cleaned tile, the mirror remains fog less after filling the reservoir with hot shower water, the squeegee cleans the glass and the LED lights were bright enough for great visibility shaving but not too bright to be blinding as some reviews have mentioned. This has really spiffed up my shower appearance as well, giving it a more modern and cleaned up look. Would recommend to anyone to at least try.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much more than my last.
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheap one that was constantly falling off the wall because it was a suction cup. It broke finally so I ordered one of these bad boys. Stuck nice and tight to the tile walls. Hasn't budged a bit. SO loves that it has lights so he doesn't have to open the show curtain to see where he's shaving. A LOT easier to fill than our last one. Probably the best purchase I've made in a while.
customer_reviews.author: BrockintheBox

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and does what it should do!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a couple of different types of shower mirrors and been dissapointed in the past by two primary issues: 1. Most mirrors that I've seen will fall down at some point because they rely on suction cups or some other weak solution for adhering to the wall. 2. Every other mirror that I've seen will ultimately lose it's fog proof coating and then you have to replace the mirror. This was designed with a great solution for mounting and the engineering behind keeping the mirror fogproof is great! The included squeegee is handy as well. I'd definitely recommend this mirror to anyone who wants a reliable solution for shaving in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Good Mirror, Spontaneous Cracking
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works. The lights could be brighter but that's ok. Easy to install and stays on the wall great, very sturdy. Hard to adjust the angle of the mirror. After 6 months a spontaneous crack appeared in the lower left corner of the frame. The mirror has never been dropped and I only fill it up with water every few months. The lights still work.
customer_reviews.author: PlushPippin

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirror just a bit bulkier than I would like
customer_reviews.text: The mirror works great and does exactly as advertised. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because of how bulky it is and if really sticks out from the wall. And the 3M adhesive tape is so strong that I am not waiting for the day I decide to remove it. But the mirror does NOT fog, the LEDs work good. Overall it is a good buy if you are ok with the bulkiness
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Adding water, the primary feature, makes the mirror appear curved.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough on it's own. The lighting isn't worth it, wayyy too dim, and doesn't actually help show you anything unless you're showing in pitch black. Additionally, once filled with water it adds a super strong parallax, similar curved mirror, that gives me a wicked headache. But, it didn't fog, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now, best shower mirror I've had yet. Work perfect & have had no issues of it degrading over time. Strong pre-installed adhesive holds great. Led lights provide some additional light, but you're not going to shave in the dark w/ it. Squeegee provided does the job, like that it is integrated in the design. Shelf is great as well. I hold 2 large shavers on it at all times. Don't know what some other users are doing or using that they complain it's to small. This is a great buy & would recommend to anyone looking for a shower mirror.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Steel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, sticks well. The light could be slightly brighter.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, sticks well. The light could be slightly brighter, I got it because the lighting in my bathroom could be better? But no major complaints. The mirror isn't exactly flat so it does skew your look slightly, but not enough to make it hard to shave. It almost gives the "fun house" feel when you look into the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: BCG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Other shower mirrors I've had fall off the wall and break. This one has a large permanent adhesive pad. As long as you follow the instructions on how to prepare the surface prior to installation your mirror should stay solidly in place as mine has. It's easy to fill, and I like the LED lights surrounding the perimeter of the frame. I also love that it comes with a mini squeegee to clear the surface of droplets. Overall a very well designed, well made product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BuckG71

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Stick.
customer_reviews.text: We never could get it to stick to the shower wall and once you disturb the back, you have to purchase more backing. We couldn't use it how it was designed so it was a waste of money. Anything that is a total waste of money for me usually gets one star. It also isn't sturdy enough to withstand many falls into the bath tub so there's that issue too.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m Enjoying it. Definitely a nice addition to my shower. Get asked about it any time anyone sees it. Love being able to look in the mirror and turn the light on for extra light when washing my face & shaving etc. Also filling the back of the mirror up with warm water so it don’t fog is the greatest idea I’ve ever seen! Whoever thought of that idea is definitely a genius. Works great! And so cool it comes with a little built in squeegee to wipe the mirror down after filling it up with water.
customer_reviews.author: ♡Charlotte M.

customer_reviews.title: Great no-fog shower mirror
customer_reviews.text: My husband was using one of my old portable makeup mirrors and so I decided to find him something of his own. Saw this and the great reviews so I bought it for him for Christmas. Took us a while to finally put it up but it's great. The hardest part was getting the film off of the adhesive for the bracket. It's a great mirror, adjustable angle, lighted, anti-fog, with a shelf for your razor and a squeegee. It's perfect and so far working splendidly.
customer_reviews.author: CMc007

customer_reviews.title: SO-SO
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in one thing Although I'm standing RIGHT in front of it, it makes me look like I am like a foot or two further back, so it's harder to shave. It is harder because I have to move the shower head to get RIGHT UP ON IT, haha. The lighting could be brighter. Overall, I MAY have paid too much for this.
customer_reviews.author: John 3:16

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this type of mirror. I really like the larger size and it certainly never fogs. The only thing keeping it from 5 stars is the lighting. As others have said it's pretty much useless. I good idea but it does more to blind me that to light up my face for shaving. I still love the mirror though.
customer_reviews.author: orickoh

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been a fan of the ToiletTree fogless mirror for years. This is our third one, not because the other's broke but due to moving and leaving the old one behind. This mirror truly is fogless, and the extra light feature is amazing. Hubby gets a good shave, and I can tweeze my eyebrows in the shower with no problems. We have never had an issue with the adhesive, or any of the other features offered with this mirror. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Big, sturdy, lighted. Cute squeegee. Exactly what I wanted. Make sure you check position before you stick.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lomelino

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure i can find the right words to truly describe how disappointed I am in this product. Not only did this mirror not make it through the first ten minutes of the first shower I ever used it for but it also, as the attached photo illustrates, cut me as it took its epic dive. I guess I should be grateful that the glass didn’t shatter into a thousand pieces into my bathtub and also cut the bottom of my feet. And, yes, I followed all the instructions for proper suction/adhesion to shower wall. I’m so livid right now.
customer_reviews.author: Gardy V. Guerrier

customer_reviews.title: Stays in the tile and can’t figure up!
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time. Would give it six stars if possible. On every count, it solves all the prior problems of using a shaving mirror in the shower. ToiletTrees instructions are flawless. Go with the larger lighted model at $39. Fabulous, beautiful product. I’m handicapped and it my shower shave a joy!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but doesn't stick on the wall for that long but great customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it in September 2019, but already started to fall of the bathroom wall. Great product for the price, but the tape that secures it needs to be better. Very happy with the customer support, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Seems like this mirror has everything but...
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't been able to use this mirror yet because the adhesive backing was insufficient to keep it affixed to the wall. I also tried using a few Command adhesive strips, but those aren't working either. My tiles have a slight texture, so I'm going to try silicone glue next. Will update review when I've had a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: the quality of reflection is pretty unacceptable. The mirror works if you are using ...
customer_reviews.text: The mirror isn't made of real glass. This is understandable as bathroom mirrors probably slip and hit the floor more often than real mirrors... fake glass may even be the standard for shower mirrors... that being said, the quality of reflection is pretty unacceptable. The mirror works if you are using it up close, but you move a foot away and the image gets distorted. This is probably due to the fact that the reflective material is not made of glass and therefore has been warped and is no longer completely flat. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leo N

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly..... broken? [But you should still buy it]
customer_reviews.text: I crossed my fingers and hoped for tye best with this. My husband shaves his face and head in the shower. The band aid supplies constantly ran low. This mirror has been absolutely perfect. A year after I bought it for him as a gift, I made the effort to use it myself.. not difficult at all. The problem: the adhesive failed tonight, a year later. It's broken. And so are we. Not really, but dammit. When something this great breaks, it's unexpectedly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: amsd2dth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. A couple upgrades would make it better!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I would like to suggest 2 simple changes to the manufacture. 1. Place a small pin hole on the bottom so the water will drip out very slowly. Will prevent you from dumping it after every use. 2. Put a timer on the led light. Will save batteries for the people like me that forget to turn it off. I would suggest this mirror to anyone I know though. Love it! I use it every day! Works like it should. I would upgrade my review to 5 starts if it had the upgrades I listed above. If you thinking about buying this product. Its worth every penny! Hope this review helps!!
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R

customer_reviews.title: I love my ToiletTree Shower Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I love my ToiletTree Shower Mirror! I have gone through three other mirror's and have been frustrated by lights that shine in my eye or worse yet don't provide enough illumination. Others required constant re-application of non fogging sprays to get them to remain functional. Other's are small and impossible to see your entire face. This product provides a solution to all of those problems! I fill it with hot water from my shower head in about 5 seconds, place it on its mount and turn on the light. I get the most comfortable shave ever right in the shower...no separate mess. Do yourself a favor and buy this mirror!!
customer_reviews.author: JimW

customer_reviews.title: Best Shaving mirror on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband! He prefers to shave in the shower. He had an older model of this mirror. The new mirror is great because of the lights it now has. Really helps to see. Toiletree definitely makes the best shaving mirrors. Always fog free! Perfect shaving mirror!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Joffrion

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I shaved without this!
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased both the 1st and this 2nd version of shower mirrors. I mounted them both and am highly impressed. - Doesn't fog up like most do - The lights are an underestimated feature you never thought you would want, but you will now need with your next mirror - Couldn't be more satisfied with this purchase. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion failed on one of the soap dispensers
customer_reviews.text: I like how the mirror is setup and the overall design of it and the soap dispensers. They are built quite well and one of the soap dispensers did survive a fall with no noticeable damage. The only bad thing was the the adhesion failed on one of the soap dispensers causing it to fall off the wall and spilled soap everywhere. It was up for three days before falling. The mirror and other soap dispensers are still holding strong on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Shower Mirrow in my 3rd apartment...first two were better
customer_reviews.text: I liked the new larger size of this mirror and the LED lighting due to poor lighting in my bathroom. However, the LED lights are not really strong enough to illuminate my face when I shave. The lower portion of the unit that holds the squeegee is also crooked...which is making me a bit crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Pearson

customer_reviews.title: LEDs good idea on paper, not so good in practice.
customer_reviews.text: The fog free works great! By pouring warm water in the reservoir behind the mirror, the mirror heats up and doesn't fog. The LEDs are another story. For me, in a relatively dark shower, the LEDs illuminate my face only when I get about 2 inches or less from the mirror. Any farther back, and they simply glare in my eyes, causing my pupils to contract, making my reflection appear darker! Also, the light is a very cold, harsh white. The only way a person would get a reflection as shown in the illustrating photo is to be in an already brightly lit room, thus negating the need for the LEDs.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbeat

customer_reviews.title: no mess at sink. Face is soft and shavable in shwr. 👌👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This is ideal for people who shave their head and face every single day. Keeps skin warm, soft and, very shaveable in the warmth of the shower. No mess to clean up at your sink. Been using it every day for many years now. Not once has it ever fallen off my wall. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Enderle

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I use this to shave in the shower. Filled it with hot water. No fog. Extra clear and flawless mirror. The light is an added benefit. Makes seeing beard hairs very easy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Losier

customer_reviews.title: Revolutionary product for me!
customer_reviews.text: OK, so this product is quite possibly the best thing I got for Christmas. I shave my head and face every day and there is not a lot of light in my shower. I have used other "fogless" mirrors, but they always last about a week and then start fogging up pretty easily and the condensation makes the visibility really poor. This one is AWESOME!!! The light is great. Construction is solid. They've thought it through with the squeegie holder and the razor rack. Mounting was a snap and solid. I can't say enough about this product. It's a game changer for me. I would buy this again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: good and ok
customer_reviews.text: works well. but the light could be better. but the worse is the mirror. it states to add cold water and that it will not fog. but it fogs up in my house. the rest is great
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mor

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror and doesn't fog
customer_reviews.text: This is great for shaving in the shower! Because you fill the back of the mirror with warm water, it doesn't fog up. Plus, you're not wasting water like some shower mirrors that divert water through the mirror casing. I used to own one of that type and it was just OK -- didn't prevent fogging. This is the second "Fogless Shower Mirror" I bought -- the first didn't have LED lighting, but it's pretty useless add-on because the light isn't bright enough to light my face. It's more of a gimmick than anything. I like the mirror though.
customer_reviews.author: White Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but lighting just adequate
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much lives up to expectations: 1) No condensation if filled up with very hot water, but water drops necessitate occasional squeegee. 2) No mirror distortion 3) Adhesion works well on smooth wall if directions are followed For shaving: 1) Mount mirror a tad low to get a good below-chin angle 2) Choose mounting point wisely for light. The mirror's lights are just adequate Happy with purchase. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough
customer_reviews.text: Sticks well, doesnt fog when u add hot water but anoying you have to take it off each time to fill, then to empty, would be better if it came with a little jug to fill it and a bit at the bottom to let the water out. The light isnt great but manageable
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...Except...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I highly recommend. The only reason I gave it a four is that the light is not very bright. I can actually see my face better with it off. The light needs a little modification. I still would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Casey

customer_reviews.title: The best shower mirror we've purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent size and the light and fogless mirror make for an accurate shave in the shower. It can be mounted easily where you choose. So much better than other shower mirrors that have to be connected at the shower head that can effect water pressure and drip constantly. Just remember to fill this with water as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: TrykaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: You can lead the horse to water
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to tempt my husband to shave in the shower instead of the sink. He hasn’t but my 2year old loves it. Easy to stick on and hasn’t fallen. The light is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn B Vickery

customer_reviews.title: This mirror works well if two things are remembered: ...
customer_reviews.text: This mirror works well if two things are remembered: 1) clean the surface to be mounted to with alcohol, then let dry, before attaching the mirror; 2) use a finger-smear worth of bath soap over the mirror's entire surface, in order to reduce fogging. There will be some fogging, but nothing that cannot be lived with. I do not fill with warm water, and have not seen the need to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Marshal Mercer

customer_reviews.title: it works great. He absolutely loves this mirror
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my honey for his birthday. I did quite a bit of research on these fog-less mirrors beforehand and finally settled on this one. Apparently, it's the supreme version of fog-less mirror, and rightfully so! I must say, to my surprise, it works great. He absolutely loves this mirror. No more pulling back the shower curtain in an attempt to shave from the big mirror over the sink! If anything ever happened to it, I could say with certainty that I would purchase a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: The mirror is great, and the lights are helpful in the shower
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is great, and the lights are helpful in the shower; however, the double-stick adhesive did not last long for us. We wound up going to Home Depot and picking up some double-sided tape that was rated for outdoor use. Now that sucker isn't moving unless we want it to. Ever. Maybe not even then. Hard to say.
customer_reviews.author: J Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: A much needed product but could be a bit better...
customer_reviews.text: The convenience of shaving while in the shower cannot be overstated and this mirror provides that. It is easy to install, excellent in quality, and simple to use and keep operational. However, I would be first in line to purchase a new model if it were a bit larger and had a magnifying capability. I need to use my glasses with the current model, and since they fog up, i have to do without a clear view to shave. If you have 20/20 vision, then go for it! But I'd like to know when the new model comes out and I'll sing its praises... In sum, great quality, good performance, but could stand some tweaking to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hudson

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't got up!
customer_reviews.text: The mirror is easy to set up and it is nice and clear. It dosn't fog up so I can shave in the shower now. The mirrow quality is very good but there is a small abount of image distorsion. But its not bad enough to not like it though.
customer_reviews.author: peter sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very good stick-up
customer_reviews.text: Had used one of their other illuminated mirrors that was great. On this model I’m a bit disappointed with the lack of illumination.
customer_reviews.author: T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Does become water damaged eventually, but my husband loves this lighted mirror.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one we have bought. He squeegees it every time he is in the shower and wipes it with his towel. Still better than any others out there.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Balafoutis

customer_reviews.title: so keep missing spots light is nice and seems well made but sticks out of shower ...
customer_reviews.text: bulky which I returned it in time, also the view in NOT Magnified, so keep missing spots light is nice and seems well made but sticks out of shower so much.. and you need to keep squeejy it every time and everytime fill with water
customer_reviews.author: Alive Media Creations

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Mirror, excellent attachment
customer_reviews.text: Large adhesive pad. Holds VERY well on ceramic. Lifts off easy to fill with hot water. You only get one chance to attach it, so have a level handy and/or a friend to make sure you have it at the right height and straight. Great mirror. Works great. Large enough to see well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly decent
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a while but if you take a long shower you have to re-add water. Not a bad product I was shocked it actually worked to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Kris martin

customer_reviews.title: The Shower Shaving Solution!
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with this item. Would give it a "5" if the light was more effective--you must be very close to see your face illuminated. My shower happens to be well lit, so this is not a REAL concern for me. But if you are considering this item for it's lighting feature only, and do not want to shave within a foot of it, move on. The mirror is very clear and SLIGHTLY distorted, but not enough to concern me. The size and fog-free technology is what I really wanted, and could not be more pleased from those perspectives. I recommend this mirror and look forward using it for the indefinite future
customer_reviews.author: Barry52755

customer_reviews.title: Superior design and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a Brookstone fogless mirror that was so difficult to keep clean, the suction cups often failed, the water reservoir became moldy, and eventually, the hard water clogged the interior and I had to toss it. This mirror is a much superior design! Easy to fill with hot water, easy to put back up. Large mirror and exceptional lighting. The shelf and squeegee are convenient. The mirror is easy to keep clean. This is a well thought out product and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a MAJOR FLAW.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product and it is sad to see that marketers / manufacturers do not know what poor taste is. Here is the scoop: On the center of the mirror, it says in black letters the brand which, in part, contains the word "toilet". So, you are in the shower, getting clean presumably, and the word TOILET in staring at you while you are in the shower. FAIL! it is the equivalent to someone putting a non-removable logo on a bathroom mirror! Oh, wait . . . LORD!!!! THIS IS A BATHROOM MIRROR! Please make this a sticker or make it gone!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Happy hubby shaving in the shower!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this!!! It truly does not fog up in the shower! The light is definitely a nice feature and it also comes with an little squeegee to sweep away the water splashes. The squeegee has a discrete compartment for it and it sticks very tightly to the shower wall!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Mirror so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third shower mirror my fiance has had in the last four years (and the second one that I have replaced for him). The other two had a marked tendency to lose their grip on the shower wall and crash to the floor which, besides making a startling noise (What the heck was THAT!), was rather detrimental to the razor as well as the mirror. So this mirror seems firmly attached to the tile! I love the little squeegee that comes with it, too. And keeping it fog-free is guaranteed since the trick is the warmer water in the reservoir. That means no special coating to wear off or gradually lose effectiveness. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great mirror. Outstanding Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this mirror nine months ago. It was doing great for about eight months. Then some spotting started to show up on the mirror. I sent an email to Toilet tree and they responded promptly. They replaced the mirror extremely quickly. After review of the instructions I believe what happened was that the mirror was cleaned with either bleach or glass cleaner. A big no no. This caused the spotting. So grateful to Kelly at Toilet tree for the outstanding customer service. Buy this mirror. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad the Inhaler

customer_reviews.title: FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for almost a year now. Works as advertised. I don’t understand some of the negative reports. If you follow the instructions, it works. Hot water, never fogs up. I can see every part of my beard which, allowes me to achieve a close shave every time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn’t keep mirror on shower wall.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive doesn’t retain mirror on shower wall. Mirror fell after first use. Spent time removing the adhesive to replace with Velcro and it fell after second use. This time the hinge broke. Returning for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it every day to shave my face and head, which gives me an excuse to hog the shower. ;-) The LEDs started getting flakey after a few months. I contacted ToiletTree through Amazon and was sent a replacement mirror immediately. Great customer service. Yesterday I knocked it off it's base and came here to purchase a replacement. I've owned this thing for years and don't want to go back to shaving after my shower.
customer_reviews.author: John Henry

customer_reviews.title: ToiletTree Products shipped the 2 mirrors ahead of schedule, packaged nicely and was exactly as stated.  This is an A+ seller!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mirrors, one for each bathroom. My son and husband have had no complaints about them and believe me if there were problems they'd let me know. Being that I am only five feet tall the mirror in the master bath is set pretty high and the only problem I see is they are very tight and difficult to adjust. Fortunately I don't generally need to use it. We recommend this particular mirror as they are far superior to any other type we have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: KMD

customer_reviews.title: REVISED: Overall a big disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This fogless mirror is not very convenient to use at each use requires manually filling a reservoir behind the mirror with hot shower water. The built-in LED light is far too dim to shave by unless your shower stall is already well-lit. Worse, the adhesive strips and glue provided DO NOT hold the unit to a normal tile wall for more than a couple of weeks. After four tries re-installing this mirror I have given up and am throwing it away. In short, nice idea, poor design and execution.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Good product and works as advertised. Quick delivery but be aware that the manual may state the LED lights are settable for high or low but really has an on-off state which is fine. Each time before shaving, the product has to be removed from the wall mount and water added. Simple step and easy to perform. I found that after each shave I need to empty the reservoir because otherwise I could hear a slight drip, drip, drip at night. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DanyoLaker

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for more than six months. It took me 45 minutes to install, however 35 of those minutes were used figuring out exactly where I wanted it to sit. It took the remaining ten minutes to attach to the wall. I use it every day. I have occasionally left it on all day. I am now unable to use it as intended, until I go out and buy some batteries. This will be the first time installing new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Carlton of Boston

customer_reviews.title: this seemed like the perfect shower mirror
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews, this seemed like the perfect shower mirror. Unfortunately, it's not much of a mirror at all. The best I can describe it is looking into a very shiny surface... you see your reflection, but not nearly good enough to accurately shave. I had already installed it so I decided to not go through the trouble of taking it down... but less than 2 months later, it fell down on its own and broke into several pieces. Oh well... $40 wasted. I’ m writing this review so you can keep your $40... hopefully this saves you from some frustration.
customer_reviews.author: rhop

customer_reviews.title: Dim light.
customer_reviews.text: It is a convex mirror which requires you to get much closer in order to be able to see what you are doing. The size of the mirror is good but it needs a much brighter light , it is very dim. The mirror does not fog up though which I am happy about.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Light stopped working!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son really liked this mirror for shaving, we have had the mirror 4 months and the light has stopped working and is not the batteries. The return window closed 1 month after the purchase. So we can't return it which sucks!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Averhart

customer_reviews.title: I needed this!
customer_reviews.text: Love the features it carries. My shower is a bit dark so the Led lighting suits me perfectly when I shave my head and face in the shower. Also carries a swipe conveniently to wipe away the droplets. It remains fogless, however you have to pour warm/Hot water on it with your shower head to get a complete clear view from time to time. Lastly, I sticked it to my bathroom shower tiles and it is currently sticking up very well and firm. Overall I am really contempt and satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DiverseNYC

customer_reviews.title: Won't Stick.
customer_reviews.text: I can't review how well the mirror works since I couldn't ever get it to stick to the wall. 3 months after it was given as a Christmas present we still haven't found a way- our wall isn't textured or anything to make it not stick. Major bummer. If you buy it, make sure you have a back up plan for adhesion to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: renae abel

customer_reviews.title: Husband love the product! With one minor suggestion for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a gift! As now the lighting in our new bath room is not directly from the shower unit, this mirror is really nice with the added lighting and bigger mirror surface. The fogfree feature works great too. My husband is very happy to receive and use it and had commented on one improvement that this can have to make it perfect: In his old fogless mirror, in the unit for the warm water, it has a hole so that after shower the water can slowly leak out if you forget to empty the water before you end shower, so that next time you don't have to splash cold water out.
customer_reviews.author: finalfantasy

customer_reviews.title: Best shower mirror
customer_reviews.text: Best shower mirror I've ever used. Works perfectly and does exactly what it says it does. No fog...
customer_reviews.author: BDR

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and perfection
customer_reviews.text: Wow... Really nice and perfection. 1. A little bit bigger then the normal size bath mirror.( happy) 2. has a tape attach in the mirror holder.(will never break) 3. You can pull up the mirror from the mirror holder to carry it out the shower. 4. Has a light around the mirror Just perfect I'm really HAPPY...
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Really?
customer_reviews.text: Light from LED's shine on the mirror and are blocked from shining on you by a piece of trim. Very poor engineering. The light should be directed at the subject. The mirror will then reflect the 'lit' image. Sheesh, are you guys new at this?
customer_reviews.author: Abbott

customer_reviews.title: The Best Shower Mirror
customer_reviews.text: I really like my mirror, I finally found a true fogless mirror and now I can shave in the shower without having to constantly throw water at a mirror I had before just to be able to shave and wash my face in less time!
customer_reviews.author: jmv

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE This Mirror!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son as a gift so that he could shave in the shower easily. Little did I know that I would end up loving this mirror as much as he does! The lighting works great, the mirror is large enough, it comes with a squeegee, it stays securely suctioned to the wall, it has a shelf for his razor, and most importantly it truly is fogless! The price is wonderful considering how great the quality is. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Toilet Tree Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible customer service with the manufacture. It arrived and the light didn’t works. Toilet Tree says to call them if there are any issues with the product. I called and emailed, no responses. This company is really in the toilet. Returned to Amazon since they have outstanding service. Toilet Tree stinks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell off the shower wall in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but despite following the installation instructions, it fell off the shower wall in two months. I would greatly appreciate hearing from the seller on this. I'd prefer not to have to deal with the seller this way, but the "Ask a question" feature with this seller is not working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a little larger than expected. Nice quality. Just installed. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great product, small hiccup, but great customer service and follow up
customer_reviews.text: At first when I bought this item i was very excited. After you placed water in the holding area behind the glass it would stay clear. Just a quick swipe of the squeegee and it was clear. After about 2 months, the silicone and tape loosened and it fell. The plastic brace behind the mirror broke off and was un repairable. I was not able to use it anymore. It was big disappointment as I really liked it. I am not sure if I want to spend money for it fall again and break. The product is not guaranteed not to fall. It does and when it does the delicate plastic breaks.
customer_reviews.author: carlosdlg

customer_reviews.title: Replace Monthly
customer_reviews.text: Great if you only want to use it for a month. The sticky stuff on the back does not hold up over time. When that time comes, it is coming down, and it is coming down hard. It damaged our shower on the landing (photo). Just a little knick, but that's all it takes to cause damage to your house. Recap: Lasts month. Falls hard. Hopefully not on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and mount
customer_reviews.text: This mirror was everything I was looking for. Fog less, lighted and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I Wouldn't Shave Without This
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day in the Shower and wouldn't be without it. I decided not to adhere it to the wall. I just lay it on a shelf and hold it in my hand when I shave. It never fogs up and the light makes it much easier to shave.
customer_reviews.author: randynfl

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I've used it twice and love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I've used it twice and love it. I've purchased several shower mirror products in the past but thdy don't last very long. I like the fact that putting hit water in the back of the mirror helps to keep it fogless. Most of the other mirror products ask you spray liqud on your mirror. They neve work right or last very long. My only concern with this product is how long the adhesive tape will last sticking to my shower tile. We will find out overtime!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Almost worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After cleaning and properly preparing the surface for mounting. The adhesive is already starting to come loose in one area. Hoping I do not find that it has fallen in the coming days. The mirror and light are fine, slight distortion in the mirror. Totally fog less.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Its works... at first i was skeptical ...
customer_reviews.text: Its works...at first i was skeptical about the fact you need to fill it with water but it truly is fog free if you do that. I mean no matter what fog you could imagine it won't show up at all. Hot shower? no fog...hot to cold no fog. There is noooo fog. One thing i would improve is the swivel mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: acozz23

customer_reviews.title: All good, very handy and useful
customer_reviews.text: The only reason they lost 1 star was that the light is weak and stopped working after 1 day (with new batteries!). Other than that, it's the best shaving mirror I have ever had. no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Kourosh A.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Fogless Shower Mirror That Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other fogless mirrors advertised as "fogless", but this one is the only one that actually works. You fill the reservoir in the back with warm water and presto, the mirror remains fog free for the duration of your shower. The design is elegant and the LED lighting is a nice touch. It includes all the necessary mounting hardware including a small tube of silicone to make sure that the mirror remains secure. Shaving in the shower is a manly bliss, and you really can't go wrong with this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pagan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps falling off the wall
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible in shower mirror. It wouldn’t stay on the wall even tho I followed the instructions on how to install it
customer_reviews.author: anthony route

product_meta.title: ToiletTree Products Deluxe LED Fogless Shower Mirror with Squeegee (Shower Mirror)
product_meta.description: Style:Shower MirrorThe Best Fogless Shower Mirror EVER! Just fill it with hot shower water and it's impossible for it to fog! ToiletTree Products now has a Deluxe Fogless Shower Mirror that is 20% larger than our original and is illuminated by LED lights. This patented shaving mirror is guaranteed not to fog in the shower. Simply slide the mirror off the bracket before each shower and fill with hot water. The hot water will keep the surface the same temperature as the environment in your shower which makes it scientifically impossible for your mirror to ever fog. It takes only 5-7 seconds. No more suction cups falling off the wall! Our removable silicone adhesive secures the mirror to all shower surfaces and will not damage tiles or shower walls! It conveniently detaches from the bracket so you can easily fill the reservoir before each use. An included self-stored squeegee removes any excess water drops. This lighted shower mirror is perfect for tweezing, removing makeup, applying facial masques and using our facial cleansing brush. And it comes with a built-in shelf to store your razor, sponge or tweezers. An easily adjustable bracket accommodates multiple users and angles. Shatterproof and made of high quality acrylic: impact resistant, lighter and safer, while providing a brighter, sharper image. Will not to rust, discolor or damage bathroom surfaces. Measures 9.5" x 7.5" x 1.5"Not satisfied with your purchase. We offer a 100% 30-day money back guarantee! This will be the last fog free shower mirror you will ever have to buy!
